markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Wovenwood Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1378)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 81</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This magically reinforced [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) is made by skilled Ekujae mages, who've developed unique spells for reinforcing wood collected from their forests. Each shield is embossed with the signatures of the mage and artisan who crafted it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wovenwood Shield (Minor)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 85 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

This shield has Hardness 5, Hit Points 40, and Broken Threshold 20.
